summary: Water quality is stable but requires monitoring due to slight fluctuations in TDS and temperature.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH around 6.5-7.5 for optimal tilapia and plant health.
Consider regular water changes to keep TDS below 300 ppm for optimal plant growth.
Monitor temperature closely; ensure it stays within 24-30°C for tilapia health.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.033 / 7.014 / 7.106 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 326.914 / 307.8 / 332.5 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.366 / 23.56 / 30.44 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
